long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension allows for assessment of search results on various academic websites. Upon loading of the page, the extensions returns a small *badge* about the status of each article. Upon visiting the article page in its respective website, information about that article will be displayed in a bigger badge.

Options Page: Allow so select the type of badge that will be shown next to each search result: License, Executable, Research Location, Release Time, Peer Review.
